'''''Vinyar Tengwar 3''''' is the third issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|2|4}}

* Cover — [[Patrick H. Wynne]]
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Conversational Quenya?" — Margaret Dean
* "Orc Talk" — [[Tom Loback]]
